list-item.p: Adaptogens can correct imbalances in cellular division cycles that cause cells to divide in an uncontrolled manner, eventually causing cancer.

Adaptogens have a potential to prevent or postpone chronic diseases associated with aging, recognizing their uncanny ability to fix what's wrong, boost what's right, keep the body in balance, and prevent the body's functions from deteriorating.

Adaptogenic effects like those seen in Ginseng, Rhodiola, Eleutherpcoccus, Withania, and Schisandra have been scientifically validated as being effective against chronic inflammation, atherosclerosis, neurodegenerative cognitive impairment (e.g., Alzheimer's disease and other forms of dementia), metabolic disorders, diabetes, cancer and a host of other aging‚Äêrelated diseases.
